name: laurel_world-happiness-report-data
title: World Happiness Report Data
description:
World Happiness Report 2017
Source: http://worldhappiness.report/ed/2017/

#World Happiness Report Data for 2017
from their website: 
> The first World Happiness Report was published in April, 2012, in support of the UN High Level Meeting on happiness and well-being. Since then the world has come a long way. Increasingly, happiness is considered to be the proper measure of social progress and the goal of public policy. In June 2016 the OECD committed itself “to redefine the growth narrative to put people’s well-being at the center of governments’ efforts”. In February 2017, the United Arab Emirates held a full-day World Happiness meeting, as part of the World Government Summit. Now on World Happiness Day, March 20th, we launch the World Happiness Report 2017, once again back at the United Nations, again published by the Sustainable Development Solutions Network, and now supported by a generous three-year grant from the Ernesto Illy Foundation. Some highlights are as follows.

See the Statistical Appendix attached for the following information
* 1 Data Sources and Variable Definitions
* 2 Coverage, Summary Statistics and Regression
Tables
   
Source: Helliwell, J., Layard, R., & Sachs, J. (2017). World Happiness Report 2017, New York: Sustainable Development Solutions Network.

fields.name: wp5_country
fields.title: WP5 Country
fields.description: WP5 is GWP’s coding of countries, including some sub-country territories such as Hong Kong.

fields.name: country
fields.title: country
fields.description: Country

fields.name: year
fields.title: year
fields.description: Year

fields.name: life_ladder
fields.title: Life Ladder
fields.description: Happiness score or subjective well-being (variable name ladder ).

fields.name: log_gdp_per_capita
fields.title: Log GDP per capita
fields.description: Statistics of GDP per capita (variable name gdp) in purchasing power parity (PPP) at constant 2011 int. dollar prices

fields.name: social_support
fields.title: Social support
fields.description: Social support (or having someone to count on in times of trouble) is the national avg of the binary responses (0 or 1)

fields.name: healthy_life_expectancy_at_birth
fields.title: Healthy life expectancy at birth
fields.description: The time series of healthy life expectancy at birth calculated by WHO, WDI, and other published stats

fields.name: freedom_to_make_life_choices
fields.title: Freedom to make life choices
fields.description: National avg responses to “Are you satisfied or dissatisfied with your freedom to choose what you do with your life?"

fields.name: generosity
fields.title: Generosity
fields.description: National avg responses to “Have you donated money to a charity in the past month?” on GDP per capita

fields.name: perceptions_of_corruption
fields.title: Perceptions of corruption
fields.description: Avg response to “Is corruption widespread throughout the government...”  “Is corruption widespread within businesses...”

fields.name: positive_affect
fields.title: Positive affect
fields.description:
The average of three positive affect measures in
GWP: happiness, laugh and enjoyment in the Gallup World Poll waves 3-7

fields.name: negative_affect
fields.title: Negative affect
fields.description: The average of three negative affect measures in GWP, worry, sadness and anger

fields.name: confidence_in_national_government
fields.title: Confidence in national government
fields.description: From the GWP “Do you have confidence in each of the following, or not? How about the national government?"

fields.name: democratic_quality
fields.title: Democratic Quality
fields.description:
Based on Worldwide Governance Indicators (WGI) project
(Kaufmann, Kraay and Mastruzzi)

fields.name: delivery_quality
fields.title: Delivery Quality
fields.description:
Based on Worldwide Governance Indicators (WGI) project
(Kaufmann, Kraay and Mastruzzi)

fields.name: standard_deviation_of_ladder_by_country_year
fields.title: Standard deviation of ladder by country-year
fields.description: Alternative measures of inequality in happiness scores by wp5-year

fields.name: standard_deviation_mean_of_ladder_by_country_year
fields.title: Standard deviation/Mean of ladder by country-year
fields.description: Alternative measures of inequality in happiness scores by wp5-year

fields.name: gini_index_world_bank_estimate
fields.title: GINI index (World Bank estimate)
fields.description: GINI index from the World Bank (variable name giniIncWB and giniIncWBavg) from the World Development Indicators

fields.name: gini_index_world_bank_estimate_average_2000_13
fields.title: GINI index (World Bank estimate), average 2000-13
fields.description: GINI index from the World Bank (variable name giniIncWB and giniIncWBavg) from the World Development Indicators

fields.name: gini_of_household_income_reported_in_gallup_by_wp5_year
fields.title: gini of household income reported in Gallup, by wp5-year
fields.description: In Gallup’s “WORLDWIDE 3 RESEARCH METHODOLOGY AND CODEBOOK” (Updated 7/2015) as “Household Income  International Dollars

fields.name: most_people_can_be_trusted_gallup
fields.title: Most people can be trusted, Gallup
fields.description: Avg response to “Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted or that you have to be careful..."

fields.title: Most people can be trusted, WVS round 1981-1984
